nodes.bodyText: Maybe this should be ReorderingUtil? See #1108

nodes.bodyText: After looking I'd say this 30752 is an internal method only called from this class. (unfortunately interface static methods can only be public in java 8, so that's why). Maybe choose an internalish-name?
